name: Feed the Rat
description: Hey, fellow jammers! Feed the Rat is a top-down find the way concept which incorporates the themes "Makes total sense & It does sound like me" of this game jam. The game takes place in a dark dungeon where the we have to guide the rat to the exit by finding the path and placing cheese in such a way to guide the rat in the right direction. To avoid going out of bounds, place the lights to figure out the path in the dark and place the right amount of cheese along the way in order the rat will follow. Let's see if you can clear all 6 levels we have included and let us know your feedback.
